examples.subject: Private room availability
examples.body: Hi, do you have any private rooms available for May 10 to May 12?

examples.subject: Check-in time
examples.body: What time is check in and can we arrive early?
examples.classification_reason: Asks about check-in timing and early arrival policy.

examples.subject: How to get there
examples.body: Can you share directions from Naples to the hostel?

examples.subject: Luggage storage
examples.body: Do you offer luggage storage before check-in?
examples.classification_reason: General FAQ about services and facilities.

examples.subject: Breakfast included
examples.body: Is breakfast included in the price?

examples.subject: Age restrictions
examples.body: Do you have an age limit for dorm bookings?
examples.classification_reason: Explicit policy inquiry about age restrictions.

examples.subject: Alcohol policy
examples.body: Can we bring alcohol from outside into the rooms?
examples.classification_reason: Asks about a specific property rule.

examples.subject: Pets
examples.body: Are pets allowed in the hostel?

examples.subject: Cancellation policy
examples.body: What is your cancellation policy for refundable bookings?

examples.subject: Quiet hours
examples.body: Do you have quiet hours at night?
examples.classification_reason: Question about house rules and quiet hours.

examples.subject: Update card details
examples.body: My card failed. How can I update my payment details?

examples.subject: Prepayment failed
examples.body: You said the prepayment did not go through. What should I do?

examples.subject: Bank transfer option
examples.body: Can I pay via bank transfer instead of card?

examples.subject: Payment receipt
examples.body: Can you send me a receipt for my payment?

examples.subject: When will you charge my card
examples.body: When do you charge the remaining balance?

examples.subject: Need to cancel
examples.body: I need to cancel my booking. Can I get a refund?
examples.classification_reason: Explicit cancellation request with refund mention.

examples.subject: No show
examples.body: I missed my arrival. What happens to my booking now?

examples.subject: Change dates
examples.body: Can I cancel one night and change the dates for the rest?

examples.subject: Group cancellation
examples.body: We are a group of 6 and need to cancel due to flight issues.

examples.subject: Policy or cancellation?
examples.body: What happens if I cancel after the free cancellation period?
examples.classification_reason: Asks about consequences of cancellation; more about cancellation outcome.

examples.subject: Noise complaint
examples.body: There was loud noise in the hallway last night and we could not sleep.

examples.subject: Room cleaning issue
examples.body: Our room was not cleaned today and the bathroom was dirty.

examples.subject: Staff behavior
examples.body: One of the staff members was rude at check-in.

examples.subject: Missing item
examples.body: My charger went missing after housekeeping visited.

examples.subject: Policy frustration
examples.body: I am upset about the age restriction policy and want to complain.
examples.classification_reason: Complaint about policy impact, not a request for policy details.

examples.subject: Multiple questions
examples.body: What time is check-in and do you have luggage storage?
examples.classification_reason: Contains more than one distinct question.

examples.subject: Directions and parking
examples.body: How do we get there from Naples and is there parking nearby?

examples.subject: Payment and policy
examples.body: When do you charge the card and what is the cancellation policy?

examples.subject: Arrival and breakfast
examples.body: Can we arrive early and is breakfast included?

examples.subject: Booking changes
examples.body: Can I change my dates and is there a fee if I cancel?
examples.classification_reason: Contains both modification and cancellation policy questions.

examples.subject: WiFi
examples.body: Do you have free WiFi in the rooms?

examples.subject: Late check-in
examples.body: Is late check-in allowed after 10:30 pm?

examples.subject: Deposit question
examples.body: Is there a deposit for the keycard and how do I pay it?

examples.subject: Non-refundable booking
examples.body: I booked non-refundable. Can I cancel anyway?

examples.subject: Wrong room
examples.body: We were assigned the wrong room type and want to complain.

examples.subject: Check-in and directions
examples.body: What time is check-in and how do we reach you by ferry?
examples.classification_reason: Multiple distinct questions in one email.
